document_data.caption: A map showing the Genies' Caravan (in red) passing through the Genies' Anvil.
document_data.name: Genies' Caravan
document_data.mainbody: The '''Genies' Caravan''' was a small road found within the [[High Desert]] of [[West Zakhara]].
document_data.Description: The road connected the heart of the [[Genies' Anvil]] with the [[Aman Oasis]] near the [[Spine of the Dog]]. The route was used to trade with the [[Jann of the High Desert]].{{Speculation}}
